text: Elections to the Assam Legislative Assembly were held on February 25, 1957. 312 candidates contested for the 94 constituencies in the Assembly. There were 14 two-member constituencies and 80 single-member constituencies. ==Results== ==See also== * 1957 elections in India * 1952 Assam Legislative Assembly election ==References== 1957 1957 Category:1957 State Assembly elections in India
title: 1957 Assam Legislative Assembly election
